entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
I want to return a VeloBand Pulse I bought a couple of weeks ago. It's not working properly and I'm incredibly frustrated. I need this sorted out ASAP.
I understand your frustration, and I'll do my best to help. Could you please provide me with your order number or email address associated with the purchase?
It's order number VF78921. Look, I don't have all day. This VeloBand Pulse smart watch is a piece of junk. I want my money back.
Thank you. I've located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse 15 days ago. According to our return policy, you have up to 90 days to return the item for a full refund.
90 days? Really? I thought I was past the return window. That's a relief. So, what do I need to do?

Yes, that's correct. To initiate the return, I'll need to send you a prepaid shipping label. You can then repackage the VeloBand Pulse and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund.
Okay, that sounds simple enough. Just send me the label. And make sure the refund is processed quickly this time.

Absolutely. I've already generated the prepaid shipping label and emailed it to the address associated with your account. You should receive it within the next few minutes. Please be sure to include all original packaging when you return the VeloBand Pulse. As a one-time courtesy, I will also add a 10% discount code to your account that can be used on your next purchase. The code is WELCOME10.
Wow, that's great! Thank you so much. I appreciate you going the extra mile.
You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thanks again for your help!
Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
